title: ECR beach on evening on crucing hype.
description: Me and my cousin watching some random videos on youtube and I was hyped after watching a Ninja crucing in a video, So then i thought. Ok come lesgo for a ride.

title: MT15 to ECR for a birthday treat.
description: I was in dorm sleeping in office, A call from friends, `hope on lesgo for a treat` and then the rest are memories.

title: Thiruthani with Guys
description: First time riding a 100+ on a own bike, TBH I was literally scared to take a first long.. But felt so easy and crazy too.
